Class CcddUndoHandler.UndoableTableModel

java.lang.Object
javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel
javax.swing.table.DefaultTableModel
CCDD.CcddUndoHandler.UndoableTableModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, TableModel
Enclosing class:
CcddUndoHandler
protected class CcddUndoHandler.UndoableTableModel extends DefaultTableModel
Table model class for handling cell undo/redo edits

    • cleanUpCellValue

      protected Object cleanUpCellValue(Object value, int row, int column)
      Placeholder for performing any clean-up of the cell value prior to setting the cell contents. This can include, for example, removal of leading and trailing white space characters
      Parameters:
      value - New cell value
      row - Table row, model coordinates
      column - Table column, model coordinates
      Returns:
      Cell value following any clean-up actions
